My<S>3450</S> little children<S>5040</S>, these things<S>5023</S> write I<S>1125</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, that<S>3363</S> ye sin<S>264</S> not<S>3363</S>. And<S>2532</S> if<S>1437</S> any man<S>5100</S> sin<S>264</S>, we have<S>2192</S> an advocate<S>3875</S> with<S>4314</S> the Father<S>3962</S>, Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> the righteous<S>1342</S>:
And<S>2532</S> he<S>846</S> is<S>2076</S> the propitiation<S>2434</S> for<S>4012</S> our<S>2257</S> sins<S>266</S>: and<S>1161</S> not<S>3756</S> for<S>4012</S> ours<S>2251</S> only<S>3440</S>, but<S>235</S> also<S>2532</S> for<S>4012</S> the sins of the whole<S>3650</S> world<S>2889</S>.
And<S>2532</S> hereby<S>1722</S> <S>5129</S> we do know<S>1097</S> that<S>3754</S> we know<S>1097</S> him<S>846</S>, if<S>1437</S> we keep<S>5083</S> his<S>846</S> commandments<S>1785</S>.
He that saith<S>3004</S>, I know<S>1097</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> keepeth<S>5083</S> not<S>3361</S> his<S>846</S> commandments<S>1785</S>, is<S>2076</S> a liar<S>5583</S>, and<S>2532</S> the truth<S>225</S> is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> in<S>1722</S> him<S>5129</S>.
But<S>1161</S> whoso<S>3739</S> keepeth<S>302</S> <S>5083</S> his<S>846</S> word<S>3056</S>, in<S>1722</S> him<S>5129</S> verily<S>230</S> is<S>5048</S> the love<S>26</S> of God<S>2316</S> perfected<S>5048</S>: hereby<S>1722</S> <S>5129</S> know we<S>1097</S> that<S>3754</S> we are<S>2070</S> in<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S>.
He that saith<S>3004</S> he abideth<S>3306</S> in<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S> ought<S>3784</S> himself<S>846</S> also<S>2532</S> so<S>3779</S> to walk<S>4043</S>, even as<S>2531</S> he<S>1565</S> walked<S>4043</S>.
Brethren<S>80</S>, I write<S>1125</S> no<S>3756</S> new<S>2537</S> commandment<S>1785</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, but<S>235</S> an old<S>3820</S> commandment<S>1785</S> which<S>3739</S> ye had<S>2192</S> from<S>575</S> the beginning<S>746</S>. The old<S>3820</S> commandment<S>1785</S> is<S>2076</S> the word<S>3056</S> which<S>3739</S> ye have heard<S>191</S> from<S>575</S> the beginning<S>746</S>.
Again<S>3825</S>, a new<S>2537</S> commandment<S>1785</S> I write<S>1125</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, which thing<S>3739</S> is<S>2076</S> true<S>227</S> in<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S> and<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S>: because<S>3754</S> the darkness<S>4653</S> is past<S>3855</S>, and<S>2532</S> the true<S>228</S> light<S>5457</S> now<S>2235</S> shineth<S>5316</S>.
He that saith<S>3004</S> he is<S>1511</S> in<S>1722</S> the light<S>5457</S>, and<S>2532</S> hateth<S>3404</S> his<S>846</S> brother<S>80</S>, is<S>2076</S> in<S>1722</S> darkness<S>4653</S> even until<S>2193</S> now<S>737</S>.
He that loveth<S>25</S> his<S>846</S> brother<S>80</S> abideth<S>3306</S> in<S>1722</S> the light<S>5457</S>, and<S>2532</S> there is<S>2076</S> none<S>3756</S> occasion of stumbling<S>4625</S> in<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S>. <sup>occasion: Gr. scandall</sup>
But<S>1161</S> he that hateth<S>3404</S> his<S>846</S> brother<S>80</S> is<S>2076</S> in<S>1722</S> darkness<S>4653</S>, and<S>2532</S> walketh<S>4043</S> in<S>1722</S> darkness<S>4653</S>, and<S>2532</S> knoweth<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> whither<S>4226</S> he goeth<S>5217</S>, because<S>3754</S> that darkness<S>4653</S> hath blinded<S>5186</S> his<S>846</S> eyes<S>3788</S>.
I write<S>1125</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, little children<S>5040</S>, because<S>3754</S> your sins<S>266</S> are forgiven<S>863</S> you<S>5213</S> for<S>1223</S> his<S>846</S> name's<S>3686</S> sake<S>1223</S>.
I write<S>1125</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, fathers<S>3962</S>, because<S>3754</S> ye have known<S>1097</S> him that is from<S>575</S> the beginning<S>746</S>. I write<S>1125</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, young men<S>3495</S>, because<S>3754</S> ye have overcome<S>3528</S> the wicked one<S>4190</S>. I write<S>1125</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, little children<S>3813</S>, because<S>3754</S> ye have known<S>1097</S> the Father<S>3962</S>.
I have written<S>1125</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, fathers<S>3962</S>, because<S>3754</S> ye have known<S>1097</S> him that is from<S>575</S> the beginning<S>746</S>. I have written<S>1125</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, young men<S>3495</S>, because<S>3754</S> ye are<S>2075</S> strong<S>2478</S>, and<S>2532</S> the word<S>3056</S> of God<S>2316</S> abideth<S>3306</S> in<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S>, and<S>2532</S> ye have overcome<S>3528</S> the wicked one<S>4190</S>.
Love<S>25</S> not<S>3361</S> the world<S>2889</S>, neither<S>3366</S> the things that are in<S>1722</S> the world<S>2889</S>. If<S>1437</S> any man<S>5100</S> love<S>25</S> the world<S>2889</S>, the love<S>26</S> of the Father<S>3962</S> is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> in<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S>.
For<S>3754</S> all<S>3956</S> that is in<S>1722</S> the world<S>2889</S>, the lust<S>1939</S> of the flesh<S>4561</S>, and<S>2532</S> the lust<S>1939</S> of the eyes<S>3788</S>, and<S>2532</S> the pride<S>212</S> of life<S>979</S>, is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> of<S>1537</S> the Father<S>3962</S>, but<S>235</S> is<S>2076</S> of<S>1537</S> the world<S>2889</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the world<S>2889</S> passeth away<S>3855</S>, and<S>2532</S> the lust<S>1939</S> thereof<S>846</S>: but<S>1161</S> he that doeth<S>4160</S> the will<S>2307</S> of God<S>2316</S> abideth<S>3306</S> for<S>1519</S> ever<S>165</S>.
Little children<S>3813</S>, it is<S>2076</S> the last<S>2078</S> time<S>5610</S>: and<S>2532</S> as<S>2531</S> ye have heard<S>191</S> that<S>3754</S> antichrist<S>500</S> shall come<S>2064</S>, even<S>2532</S> now<S>3568</S> are there<S>1096</S> many<S>4183</S> antichrists<S>500</S>; whereby<S>3606</S> we know<S>1097</S> that<S>3754</S> it is<S>2076</S> the last<S>2078</S> time<S>5610</S>.
They went out<S>1831</S> from<S>1537</S> us<S>2257</S>, but<S>235</S> they were<S>2258</S> not<S>3756</S> of<S>1537</S> us<S>2257</S>; for<S>1063</S> if<S>1487</S> they had been<S>2258</S> of<S>1537</S> us<S>2257</S>, they would<S>302</S> no doubt have continued<S>3306</S> with<S>3326</S> us<S>2257</S>: but<S>235</S> they went out, that<S>2443</S> they might be made manifest<S>5319</S> that<S>3754</S> they were<S>1526</S> not<S>3756</S> all<S>3956</S> of<S>1537</S> us<S>2257</S>.
But<S>2532</S> ye<S>5210</S> have<S>2192</S> an unction<S>5545</S> from<S>575</S> the Holy One<S>40</S>, and<S>2532</S> ye know<S>1492</S> all things<S>3956</S>.
I have<S>1125</S> not<S>3756</S> written<S>1125</S> unto you<S>5213</S> because<S>3754</S> ye know<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> the truth<S>225</S>, but<S>235</S> because<S>3754</S> ye know<S>1492</S> it<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> that<S>3754</S> no<S>3956</S> <S>3756</S> lie<S>5579</S> is<S>2076</S> of<S>1537</S> the truth<S>225</S>.
Who<S>5101</S> is<S>2076</S> a liar<S>5583</S> but<S>1508</S> he that denieth<S>720</S> that<S>3754</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> is<S>2076</S> <S>3756</S> the Christ<S>5547</S>? He<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> antichrist<S>500</S>, that denieth<S>720</S> the Father<S>3962</S> and<S>2532</S> the Son<S>5207</S>.
Whosoever<S>3956</S> denieth<S>720</S> the Son<S>5207</S>, the same hath<S>2192</S> not<S>3761</S> the Father<S>3962</S>: (but) he that acknowledgeth<S>3670</S> the Son<S>5207</S> hath<S>2192</S> the Father<S>3962</S> also<S>2532</S>.
Let<S>3306</S> that therefore<S>3767</S> abide<S>3306</S> in<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S>, which<S>3739</S> ye<S>5210</S> have heard<S>191</S> from<S>575</S> the beginning<S>746</S>. If<S>1437</S> that which<S>3739</S> ye have heard<S>191</S> from<S>575</S> the beginning<S>746</S> shall remain<S>3306</S> in<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S>, ye<S>5210</S> also<S>2532</S> shall continue<S>3306</S> in<S>1722</S> the Son<S>5207</S>, and<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> the Father<S>3962</S>.
And<S>2532</S> this<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> the promise<S>1860</S> that<S>3739</S> he<S>846</S> hath promised<S>1861</S> us<S>2254</S>, even eternal<S>166</S> life<S>2222</S>.
These<S>5023</S> things have I written<S>1125</S> unto you<S>5213</S> concerning<S>4012</S> them that seduce<S>4105</S> you<S>5209</S>.
But<S>2532</S> the anointing<S>5545</S> which<S>3739</S> ye<S>5210</S> have received<S>2983</S> of<S>575</S> him<S>846</S> abideth<S>3306</S> in<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S>, and<S>2532</S> ye need<S>5532</S> <S>2192</S> not<S>3756</S> that<S>2443</S> any man<S>5100</S> teach<S>1321</S> you<S>5209</S>: but<S>235</S> as<S>5613</S> the same<S>846</S> anointing<S>5545</S> teacheth<S>1321</S> you<S>5209</S> of<S>4012</S> all things<S>3956</S>, and<S>2532</S> is<S>2076</S> truth<S>227</S>, and<S>2532</S> is<S>2076</S> no<S>3756</S> lie<S>5579</S>, and<S>2532</S> even as<S>2531</S> it hath taught<S>1321</S> you<S>5209</S>, ye shall abide<S>3306</S> in<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S>. <sup>in him: or, in it</sup>
And<S>2532</S> now<S>3568</S>, little children<S>5040</S>, abide<S>3306</S> in<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S>; that<S>2443</S>, when<S>3752</S> he shall appear<S>5319</S>, we may have<S>2192</S> confidence<S>3954</S>, and<S>2532</S> not<S>3361</S> be ashamed<S>153</S> before<S>575</S> him<S>846</S> at<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> coming<S>3952</S>.
If<S>1437</S> ye know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> he is<S>2076</S> righteous<S>1342</S>, ye know<S>1097</S> that<S>3754</S> every one<S>3956</S> that doeth<S>4160</S> righteousness<S>1343</S> is born<S>1080</S> of<S>1537</S> him<S>846</S>. <sup>ye know that every: or, know ye</sup>
